chpasswd

  1. Encrypt clear text
    perl -e 'print crypt("YourPasswd", "salt"),"\n"'
  2. change the password
    echo "username:<encrypted passwd> | sudo chpasswd -e
  3. If “YourPasswd” has an @ in it, make sure to pad it with an escape character like:
    perl -e 'print crypt("Welcome\@123", "salt"),"\n"'
